title: Advancing High-Efficiency, Stretchable Organic Solar Cells: Novel Liquid Metal Electrode Architecture
content:
Energy Environ. Sci., 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4EE03406F, Paper
Seungbok Lee, Sungjun Oh, Seoungseok Han, Dong Chan Lee, Jihyung Lee, Yonghwi Kim, Hoe-Yeon Jeong, Jin-Woo Lee, Min-Ho Lee, Wubin Ying, Seonju Jeong, Seungjae Lee, Junho Kim, Yun Hoo Kim, Bumjoon Kim, Eun-chae Jeon, Taek-Soo Kim, Shinuk Cho, Jung-Yong Lee
The development of stretchable electrodes for intrinsically stretchable organic solar cells (IS-OSCs) with both high power conversion efficiency (PCE) and mechanical stability is crucial for wearable electronics. However, research on...
